title: Model Editor: Crash sometimes when deleting link

content.raw:
It has happened a couple times. Before crashing, a message like this is printed:

~~~
[Wrn] [ModelCreator.cc:2792] Couldn't find top level visual for [ModelPreview_7::link_1_0]. Not selecting in 3D scene.
[Wrn] [ModelCreator.cc:2792] Couldn't find top level visual for [ModelPreview_7::link_1_0]. Not selecting in 3D scene.
~~~

And the moment it crashes we see the assertion error:

~~~
***** Internal Program Error - assertion (this->dataPtr->sceneNode) failed in void gazebo::rendering::Visual::SetPosition(const gazebo::math::Vector3&):
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc(1714): Visual SceneNode is NULL
~~~
